about_the_game:
Arcknight Tokens - Mankind


Humans, Halflings, Knights, Mercenaries, Mages, Children, Civilians, and much more!

Mankind is a 62 piece core set of forest-themed art. Each piece comes with Hero Portraits for all pieces as well.

This set includes:

Adventurer
Alchemist
Bard
Dead body(Male/female)
Carriage
Carriage Noble
Cart
Cavalry(3 types)
Child (7 types)
Civilian (6 types)
Cleric
Fighter (3 types)
Guard (5 types)
Halfling (5 types)
Knight (6 types)
Mage (3 types)
Mercenary (4 types)
Noble (4 types)
Paladin
Pony
Priest
Priestess (2 types)
Valkyrie

Requires: An active subscription or 1-time standard or Ultimate license of Fantasy Grounds and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
